Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>、これから どうするんだろ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what <Annie>'s planning on doing...

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカへ戻るにしても 船は出ていないしな……
Entry.EnglishText: She's not getting back to Balka since the boats can't depart.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああやって、ガジュマみんなをキライに なっちゃうなんて、かわいそうだね……
Entry.EnglishText: She's going to wind up hating every Gajuma at this rate, the poor thing...

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……ゴ、ゴメン、<Eugene>、 別に責めるつもりじゃなかったんだけど……！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh... S-Sorry, <Eugene>... I wasn't trying to blame you or anything...!
